website_summaries.verdict: These affordable votive candles are a cheery color, smell like fresh citronella, and work wonders for keeping biting bugs away from your outdoor fun.
pros: Available in sets of 12, 36, and 72 votive candles
15 hours of burn time per candle
cons: Candles do not include votive holder

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay lite
customer_reviews.text: Too bad, I had high hopes for these candle during a very mosquito season. I put them in glass voltives, light 6-8 of them, place them around out deck and light them. fast forward 5-10 minutes and more than half of them are out. The rest of them have a tiny flame that doesn't put enough citronella to keep bugs away. Glad there's insect repellent out there!
customer_reviews.author: foto

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT LAST 15 HOURS
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for two reasons, the citronella which works great but also bought for the long longevity since we burn them most nights on our porch. They lasted an hour at best. So to advertise 15 hours is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in candles. Didn’t burn 5 hours much less 15! Messy too,save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: These votives are doing a great job keeping the bugs away from my little balcony
customer_reviews.text: As described! These votives are doing a great job keeping the bugs away from my little balcony. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. They do not burn well. In a matter of a half an hour to an hour the wicks get so small that the wax just puts them out. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: But they sure smell nice.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the opportunity to use these outside yet. But they sure smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Size and color were good however packaging left a bit to be desired four of the candles were broken!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Stuck

customer_reviews.title: These candles are AMAZING..
customer_reviews.text: These candles are AMAZING.... I not only use them outside, but inside my home as well just because they smell so good.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles.. burn much longer than expected.. light citronella scent.. will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Value!
customer_reviews.text: Such a deal! Very strong citronella scent, and they do burn for 8 - 10 hours each.
customer_reviews.author: B. Loeb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Most amazingly strong Citronella scented candles ever. So worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent and worked really well to help keep the bugs away during the summer evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Purchased these to help stave off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Purchased these to help stave off the invasion in my backyard - working well thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Candle does not stay lit. Poor product. Will not buy again or recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: N. Luong

customer_reviews.title: Bright color looks nice burning in glass holder
customer_reviews.text: Very small wick doesn't burn off much citronella. Surrounded my deck with 6 burning at once with no noticeable effect.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Needs more scent
customer_reviews.text: The candles themselves burn fairly evenly and last a few hours. They are not scented very much at all though. Definitely wish they had a stronger scent to them so they would help with the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: DCat

product_meta.title: Votive Citronella Scented Candles 15 Hours - Summer Yellow - Set of 36
product_meta.description: CANDLE CHARISMA CITRONELLA SCENTED VOTIVE CANDLES are made with the highest quality wax and highly scented AUTHENTIC citronella infused fragrance ingredients to create a highly scented aroma. Keep in mind that in order citronella candles to work and be effective they must be made with REAL CITRONELLA OILS, not synthetic ones. There are citronella candles out there that smell like citronella but are not effective as they are made with a synthetic citronella fragrance that are not from citronella leaves. These Real Citronella Candles made with Authentic Citronella Incense will create the perfect atmosphere for any occasion with its glowing yellow color and general appearance. Aside from being a wonderfully addictive citrus scent, these CITRONELLA SCENTED VOTIVE CANDLES may work as an insect repellent to keep insects, bugs and mosquitoes away. These bright yellow candles will make a real summer atmosphere anywhere you place them. Keep away from things that can catch fire and away from children and pets.
feature_bullets: BURN TIME: Up to 15 hours - DIMENSIONS: approximately 1 and 3/8 inches in diameter, 2 inches in height.
These Freshly Scented Yellow Votive Candles have a real cool and crispy appearance. Use them in your spa, home, indoors, outdoors etc. They will enhance any occasion.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
